1.title: Determining who the characters are

choices: For your wife to have an increased sex drive
To be in "better shape"
For your wife to be more attracted to you
to have a bigger penis
other
11.content:
The Djinn is a large blue bald man that appears to be corporeal but also like a thin mist as well. He had no legs but appeared to be a mist out of the lamp. In a booming voice the djinn spoke. "I'm the Djinn of the lamp Astaroth. I will grant you at least 2 wishes each. However no wishes will be granted until you both have made your four wishes." He then whispered lightly where neither of you could hear. but beware because I will swap the wishes as I see fit." He then smiled at you. "I will continue to the grant wishes one at a time as long as your wishes continue to amuse me." He then told you as he looked you and Ericka over.

"Please Master and Mistress begin making your wishes now before I become bored."

You look over at Ericka and her beautiful brown hair. Her modest 36B breast, and her womanly curves and your glad you married her as you stare into her beautiful green eyes.

You then look down at yourself and you see that while you aren't ugly you have a bit of flab forming around your stomach and your muscles aren't very toned. You also have always had insecurities about your penis size. As you stand there you begin to mumble a wish out loud. "Astaroth I wish..."

14.title: You a male named MIchael and your new husband Eric

info.brief_description: You and your significant other are walking down the beach when you come across a djinn
info.description:
You are walking down the beach on your honeymoon with your significant other. As you are walking you step on something hard that hurts your foot. You look down thinking at first that it will be a shell but you quickly noticed that it was old, ornate, and made of silver. You and your significant other quickly begin to dig the object out of the sand and both laugh as you realize it is an old Arabian lamp. You then both let out a laugh as the same though crosses your mind and then you shake your heads.

before the story can continue we need to establish a couple of facts about you and your significant other.

The Rules of this story.
1) NO KILLING
2) Don't end the story
3) Only the Djinn can manipulate the wishes
4) The Djinn initially grants two wishes each but won't grant and manipulate them until all 4 wishes have been made.
5) If we are in the middle of a wish chain please keep track of what wishes have been made somewhere in the post.
